title: New Look of Driver's Licenses
text_content:
As of April 24, 2023, Virginia is phasing in the issuance of newly designed driver's licenses and ID cards. Driver's licenses and ID cards issued prior to implementation of the new design remain valid until expiration.
21 and over Driver's License, REAL ID Compliant, Veteran Indicator
21 and over Commercial Driver's License, REAL ID Compliant, Veteran Indicator
21 and over Identification Card, Non-REAL ID Compliant, Veteran Indicator
Under 21 Identification Card, REAL ID Compliant
Under 21 Driver's License, Non-REAL ID Compliant
Children's Identification Card, REAL ID Compliant
